MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Wardle, Nantwich affecting properties in Green Lane  and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1PM to make emergency repairs to a faulty transformer. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:53PM 13th April 2021
